name: Zucchini and Tomatoes With Shallots
keywords: gluten-free, vegan, vegetarian, side dish, summer, tomato, zucchini
recipeIngredient: 1 small zucchini, about 1 pound, trimmed and cut into 1/8-inch un-peeled slices, about 4 cups
3 ripe plum tomatoes, about 3/4 pound, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubes, about 1 1/2 cups
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
8 fresh basil leaves, coarsely chopped, or fresh parsley, chervil or tarragon

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a nonstick skillet. When it is quite hot add zucchini. Cook over high heat, shaking the skillet and tossing zucchini pieces gently with a spatula. Cook about 4 minutes.
Add shallots and cook 1 minute. Add tomatoes, salt, pepper and basil. Cook and toss 2 minutes more. Serve immediately.
